description_html: Introducing the world’s first wide and long wood planks built to meet the demands of high-traffic commercial interiors. Nydree’s new Wide Plank series combines the warmth of real wood, the drama of a larger dimension and the strength of acrylic infusion. The result is a “modern rustic” look in a product that is up to 300% more durable than standard wood. So years from now, your project will still stand as a testament to your talents and vision, no matter how much traffic it has seen. This American-crafted collection uses high-end Baltic-Birch plywood, UV-cured ceramicurethane and acrylic infusion making it the most durable, design-driven flooring option. The collection upholds Nydree’s promise to provide the most sustainable flooring products for commercial spaces. It is a low-emitting product, CARB Phase 2 compliant, FloorScore and Chain of Custody certified by Scientific Certification Systems to Forest Stewardship Council standards (Chain of Custody Number SCS- COC-003343).
